questionTitle: He <u><font color='red'>had to</font></u> explain the lesson very <u><font color='red'>clear</font></u> <u><font color='red'>so that</font></u> his students <u><font color='red'>could</font></u> understand it.

We wish today <u><font color='red'>was</font></u> sunny <u><font color='red'>so that</font></u> we <u><font color='red'>could spend</font></u> the day <u><font color='red'>in the country</font></u> communing with nature.
